例句: a three-inch nail
a naked man
"Hi, what's your name?" "My name's Diane."
中文說明: 「嗨！你叫甚麼名字？｣ 「我叫戴安娜。｣

例句: a narrow bridge/passage/gap
All the nations of the world will be represented at the conference.
a national holiday

中文: 天然的，非人為的;非人造的
例句: a natural substance
A healthy body will be able to fight off the illness naturally without the use of medicine.
中文說明: 健康的身體無需藥物，自身便能抵禦疾病。

例句: her love of nature
My brother is an officer in the Navy.
Is there a restaurant near here?
If there's a café nearby, we could stop for a snack.
中文說明: 如果附近有小餐館的話，我們可以停下來吃點東西。

例句: It's been nearly three months since my last haircut.
中文說明: 從我上次理髮到現在，已經快三個月了。

例句: Your house is always so neat - how do you manage it?
中文說明: 你的房子總是這麼整潔——是怎麼做到的？

例句: His clothes are all neatly folded in their drawers.
中文說明: 他的衣服都整齊地疊放在他們的抽屜裡。

中文: （用於否定句）不可避免地，必然地
例句: The fact that something is cheap doesn't necessarily mean it's of low quality.
He lacks the necessary skills for the job.
中文說明: 他不具備做這項工作所需的技能。

例句: He had the thickest neck I'd ever seen.
中文說明: 我從沒見過他那麼粗的脖子。

例句: Babies need constant care.
中文說明: 嬰兒時刻都需要人照顧。

例句: a needle and thread
We received a negative answer to our request.
Some of the neighbours have complained about the noise from our party.
中文說明: 有些鄰居已經抱怨過我們的聚會太喧鬧。

中文: 鄰近地區；住宅區，街區；街坊，四鄰
例句: There were lots of kids in my neighbourhood when I was growing up.
中文說明: 我是在有很多孩子的街區裡長大的。

例句: We've got two TVs, but neither works properly.
中文說明: 我們有兩台電視，但沒有一台是好的。

例句: the optic nerve
Do you feel/get nervous during exams?
He looked nervously over his shoulder, making sure no one else was listening.
中文說明: 他緊張地回頭望了一下，以確定沒有其他人在聽。

中文: （鳥類或昆蟲的）窩，巢;（某些動物的）穴
例句: a bird's nest
a fishing net
a television network
We've never been to Australia.
中文說明: 我們從未去過澳大利亞。

例句: I knew a lot about the subject already, but her talk was interesting nevertheless.
中文說明: 關於這個話題我已經知道很多，但她的報告聽起來還是很有趣。

例句: a new car
the newly formed residents' association
That's the best (piece of) news I've heard for a long time!
中文說明: 那是我很長時間以來聽到過最好的消息！

例句: Do you read a newspaper regularly?

中文: 下一個的；其次的；緊接著的
例句: Who works in the office next to yours?
中文說明: 誰在你隔壁的辦公室工作？

例句: I was next to last in the race.
中文說明: 我在賽跑中排名倒數第二。

例句: Did you have a nice trip?
Those trousers fit you nicely.
It gets cold at night.
The children go to bed at nine (o'clock).
中文說明: 小孩們九點鐘上床睡覺。

例句: Simson, aged nineteen, was convicted on two charges of burglary.
中文說明: 19歲的西姆森被判兩項盜竊罪罪成。

例句: The new term starts on the nineteenth (of September).
eighty-nine, ninety, ninety-one
The ninth letter of the alphabet is I.
中文說明: 字母表中第九個字母是 I。

例句: There's no butter left.
Is there nobody here who can answer my question?
中文說明: 這兒沒有人能夠回答我的問題嗎？

中文: 噪聲;雜音;嘈雜聲;喧鬧聲
例句: The noise out in the street was deafening.
中文說明: 外面街道上的喧鬧聲震耳欲聾。

例句: A motorbike started up noisily outside.
中文說明: 一輛摩托車在外面嘈雜地啓動了。

例句: a noisy crowd of fans

中文: （與形容詞和名詞連用）無，不，非
例句: non-sexist

中文: 沒有一個（人或事物）;全無
例句: None of my children has/have blonde hair.
中文說明: 我的孩子們的頭髮都不是金色。

中文: 愚蠢的想法；謬論；胡扯；胡鬧
例句: This report is nonsense and nothing but a waste of paper.
中文說明: 這份報告一派胡言，純粹是浪費紙張。

例句: At first I thought there was no one in the room.
中文說明: 起初我以為房裡沒有人。

中文: 也不（通常與 neither 連用）
例句: We can neither change nor improve it.
中文說明: 對此我們既無法改變，也無法加以改善。

例句: a normal working day
Are the phones working normally again?
中文說明: 這部電話又能正常使用了嗎？

例句: The points of the compass are north, south, east, and west.
中文說明: 羅盤上的方位點分別為北、南、東和西。

例句: northern Europe
a large/long/pointed nose

中文: （用於 be，can，have，will，must 等動詞後構成否定表達，在口語中常簡略為n't）不
例句: He's not fat!
He left a note to say he would be home late.
中文說明: 他留下字條說他會晚點回家。

例句: I noted down his phone number.
中文說明: 我記下了他的電話號碼。

例句: There's nothing in the drawer - I took everything out.
中文說明: 抽屜裡甚麼也沒有——我把所有東西都拿出去了。

例句: I noticed a crack in the ceiling.
中文說明: 我注意到天花板上有一道裂縫。

中文: 顯而易見的，明顯的，顯著的
例句: There has been a noticeable improvement in Tim's cooking.
中文說明: 提姆的烹飪水準顯著提高。

例句: a paperback novel
He's starting his new job in November.
She used to be a teacher, but now she works in publishing.
中文說明: 她過去曾是一名教師，但現在從事出版工作。

例句: These young people have nowhere (else) to go.
nuclear energy/power
25, 300, and a billion are all numbers.
He worked as a nurse in a psychiatric hospital.
a Brazil/cashew nut
